issue.title: Add test utility function for e2e validation
issue.body:
## Description

Add a simple test utility function to verify e2e test execution. This is a minimal change to exercise the full state machine workflow.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Create `test-e2e-dump/test-feature/index.ts` with a simple exported function `runTest(): boolean`
- [ ] The function should return `true` to indicate successful execution
- [ ] Add a unit test in `test-e2e-dump/test-feature/index.test.ts` that verifies `runTest()` returns `true`

## Approach

Create the test utility directory with minimal implementation.

## Iteration History

<!-- iteration_history_start -->
<!-- iteration_history_end -->
